sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> with two <radical>moon</radical>s on either side, holding the tree up in a horizontal angle, is a <kanji>shelf</kanji>.
meaningInfo: So, your shelf is made up of a tree and two moons. Imagine this shelf and put things on it. The moons are kind of rolling around, making it hard to build your shelf.
readingMnemonic: Your moon shelf is great. It's also huge, because moons are really big. That means you can store a <reading>ton-a</reading>-stuff (<ja>たな</ja>) on it.
readingInfo: Think about the ton-a-stuff you're going to put on there. Like, literally, measure out a ton of things and put them on there. It can hold it!
